textContent: You can get a 20% discount from KÃ¤mp hotels with the code `PROEVENT20`. The booking must be made online at [hotelkamp.com](https://www.hotelkamp.com) or [kampcollectionhotels.com](https://www.kampcollectionhotels.com)

Alternatively, you can get a 10% discount from Scandic Hotels with the code `FIARB`. The booking must be made at least 14 days ahead of time online at [scandichotels.com](https://www.scandichotels.com)

We are planning to open the call for proposals in April, though we don't have a precise date for it. If you buy a ticket and your talk gets accepted we will of course refund you for it (or you can transfer it to someone else yourself).
